title: Apotheon - GOG
description:
== About the game:

Apotheon is a 2D platform action-RPG set on the rich stage of ancient Greek mythology. Hera, the queen of Olympus, has overthrown her husband Zeus, and taken his throne as ruler of the Gods. Bitter and scornful towards the race of mortals, she launches a murderous campaign to scour them from the earth. As humanityÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s last champion, you must pass through the land of the dead, infiltrate Mount Olympus, and end the wrath of the Gods. With sword, spear, and shield in hand, you will sneak, conspire, loot, and battle your way through majestic palaces and chthonic depths as you climb towards godhood. Only by stripping the old gods of their powers, and taking control of the elements as your own, can humanity hope to survive the coming oblivion.


== Features:

Brutal and bloody bronze-aged combat! Slay your enemies with swords, spears, arrows, and other ancient weapons of war.
Explore the massive open world of Mount Olympus! Battle mythical beings and search for divine treasure across the Forests of Artemis, the Palaces of Apollo, and other sanctuaries of the Gods.
Guide the rise of Nikandreos, humanityÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s last hero. Interact with a colourful cast of fully voiced legendary characters throughout a rich single-player experience.
Challenge your friends to single combat! In one versus one local multiplayer, pit your skills against other would-be heroes of Greece.
Learn a little about Greek Mythology! Apotheon tries to stay true to its source material. Read an excerpt from the Iliad about Diomedes before you stick a Xiphos through his Aspis.


== Version:

GOG setup 2.0.0.1
There should be a GOG patch released soon
Included Apotheon Soundtrack from Steam


== Instructions:

It's a GOG version, just launch setup
Click options to chose location and accept EULA, install
Play - Enjoy - Seed 
You know what I need - Speed! Give me what I need! Yeah!


== System Requirements:

Minimum:
Core 2 Duo E4400 2.0GHz/Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5200+
GeForce GT 720/Radeon HD 3800 series
1 GB RAM 
Win Xp 32
DirectX 9
1GB hard disk space

To properly enjoy the game (based on user input from Game-debate.com):
Core i3-2115C 2.0GHz/Athlon II X3 455
GeForce GT 720 v2/Radeon R5 7400K
3 GB RAM
Win 7 64
DirectX 9
1 GB hard disk space

Recommended:
Core i3-3240 3.4GHz/Phenom II X4 40
GeForce GTS 450/Radeon HD 6750
2 GB RAM 
Win 7 32
DirectX 9
1 GB hard disk space


If you enjoyed the game then share with others by seeding! Or better yet 
support game development and BUY IT!

Game made by 
Alientrap
